item.title: The new era
item.description:
The New Era

It is the very end of 2015, and alot has changed since my last post in 2014.

  • Got another kid ( Mila )
  • Working at another company (Magic - still as a Front-end developer)
  • Writing this post in the new static site tool http://gohugo.io
  • Begun working with fullstack JS development (Call me Angular expert)
